name: Read And Learn
short_description:
Read And Learn is a computer program developed to help you learn spoken foreign language. It joins Internet Explorer and Windows Media Player in one program, so you can listen to audio book and read it simultaneously. Also with Read And Learn you will be able save and restore the position you finish your reading, translate a word in the text with one of dictionaries like StarDict, GoldenDict, ABBYY Lingvo in just one doubleclick and more.

Read more: http://fileforum.betanews.com/detail/Read-And-Learn/1358436630/1#ixzz3Y14Lw6KW
summary: Read And Learn is a computer program developed to help you learn spoke
